# include <stdio.h>
#include <math.h>
#include <string.h>
# include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,i,j,n,x,y,z,flag;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d",&n);
		scanf("%d %d %d",&x,&y,&z);
		x=(x*100)+(y*10)+(z);
		flag=1;
		for(i=9; i>0&&flag; i--)
		{
			y=(i*1000)+x;
			for(j=9; j>=0; j--)
			{
				z=(y*10)+j;
				if(z%n==0)
				{
					printf("%d %d %d\n",i,j,z/n);
					flag=0;
					break;
				}
			}
		}
		if(flag)
			printf("0\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
